org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners
Class RamProvisioner

java.lang.Object
  org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners.RamProvisioner
Direct Known Subclasses:
RamProvisionerSimple
public abstract class RamProvisioner
extends java.lang.Object

RamProvisioner is an abstract class that represents the provisioning policy of memory to virtual machines inside a Host. When extending this class, care must be taken to guarantee that the field availableMemory will always contain the amount of free memory available for future allocations.

Since:
CloudSim Toolkit 1.0
Author:
Rodrigo N. Calheiros, Anton Beloglazov
